## JsPlumbInstance.deleteConnectionsForElement() method

Delete all connections attached to the given element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteConnectionsForElement(el: T["E"], params?: DeleteConnectionOptions): JsPlumbInstance;
```
